Module ing.sw.ouahidi.miah.longhi
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.states

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.states.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompoundState, SimpleBuildState, SimpleMoveState, SimpleUnbuildState
    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    The smallest part of player's turn. Each state knows what a worker can do at this specific phase of the game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected boolean finalState
      if set to true the player can decide to end the turn without performing actions
      protected boolean initialState
      if set to true the player starts the turn from this state

      • getAvailableActions

        public abstract java.util.List<Action> getAvailableActions​(Board board,
                                                           Position selectedWorker,
                                                           FilterCollection moveFilter,
                                                           FilterCollection buildFilter)
        Compute the available actions that the player can perform
        Parameters:
        board - representation of the playing field
        selectedWorker - worker selected from the player
        moveFilter - filter to apply to move actions
        buildFilter - filter to apply to build actions
        Returns:
        list of available actions
